product_name: CliniqueRedness Solutions Daily Relief Face Cream With Probiotic Technology
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Redness Solutions Daily Relief Face Cream is an extra-gentle, oil-free moisturizing cream that soothes and comforts visible redness, blotchiness.
details: DetailsBenefitsFor any skin with occasional or persistent redness.Instantly calms skins with visible redness.Cream visibly soothes redness, blotchiness.Microbiome Technology includes Clinique's patented lactobacillus extract, which helps visibly soothe to support skin's natural microbiome.Use the Clinique Redness Solutions regimen to see an improvement in visible redness: cleanse with Soothing Cleanser, comfort with Daily Relief Cream, protect with Daily Protective Base. A consistent, non-irritating routine helps get redness under control.Dermatologist tested.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilDenatured alcoholSLSSLESSulfatesFragranceItem 2157845How To UseUse face cream twice a day, morning and night. Apply over makeup-free skin, avoiding eye area.Tips: For more redness relief, use after Redness Solutions Soothing Cleanser. Wear sunscreen every day - redness-prone skins may be more sensitive to sun exposure. Try Clinique's gentle formula: Redness Solutions Daily Protective Base SPF 15.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Sucrose, Isostearyl Palmitate, PEG-100 Stearate, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, Cetearyl Glucoside, Camellia Sinensis (Yellow Tea) Leaf Extract, Aspalathus Linearis (Red Tea) Leaf Extract, Saccharomyces Lysate Extract, Ascophyllum Nodosum Extract, Asparagopsis Armata Extract, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract, Yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure, Algae Extract, Caffeine, Lactobacillus Ferment, Sodium Lauroyl Oat Amino Acids, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Polyethylene, Glyceryl Stearate, Salicylic Acid, Sorbitol, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Cholesterol, Linoleic Acid, Acetyl Carnitine HCL, Glycine, Inulin, Tromethamine, Decarboxy Carnosine Hcl, Phytosphingosine, Cetyl Alcohol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Bisabolol, Squalane, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Behenyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Silica, Disodium EDTA, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Blue 1 (CI 42090), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Chromium Hydroxide Green (CI 77289), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Mica.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use face cream twice a day, morning and night. Apply over makeup-free skin, avoiding eye area.Tips: For more redness relief, use after Redness Solutions Soothing Cleanser. Wear sunscreen every day - redness-prone skins may be more sensitive to sun exposure. Try Clinique's gentle formula: Redness Solutions Daily Protective Base SPF 15.

reviews.headline: It really works!
reviews.comments: Helps keep my mild rosacea in check while keeping my skin super soft.

reviews.headline: Most definitely a repeat buy!
reviews.comments: This relief cream is wonderful, no burning or itching like others and it does take away some of the redness in my face

reviews.headline: Reduce redness somewhat but redness still there after 2 jars
reviews.comments: Reduce redness somewhat but redness still there after 2 jars

reviews.headline: It's good stuff
reviews.comments: I like this stuff a lot, however sometimes it diesnt clear the redness and can cause some redness when applying it. But overall it does work pretty well, you just have to give it a chance!

reviews.headline: My experience with this product
reviews.comments: i have sensitive skin and this made it worse it did not make the redness go away it made me get face blisters and it just did not work for me at all

reviews.headline: Just my personal opinion and experience
reviews.comments: i got this thinking it would clear up my redness but instead it made it worse and it caused to to get face blisters not pimples but face blisters

reviews.headline: Just my personal opinion and experience
reviews.comments: i got this thinking it would clear up my redness but instead it made it worse and it caused to to get face blisters not pimples but face blisters

reviews.headline: I would definitely purchase this product again
reviews.comments:
It took the redness of my face away.
Finally found the right product for my face.

reviews.headline: Yes excellent
reviews.comments: I saw this cream online on ULTA. I went in to get a sample at the Clinique counter.   I have red in my face and in one area is my right cheekbone that really stands out more red.   I apply my foundation and it covers some what but that cheek bone still shows red.  After washing off my makeup I applied the Redness Solution cream. I was amazed in the morning that I could see a difference in my face.  My cheek bone was still red but the red was lighter, yep lighter. The rest of my face was better.  I have been using it in the morning and no foundation primer.  Really it works for me without using a primer.  That's because one less step, and at night.   I absolutely love this cream.  Finally found something that works.  Morning I do shave and applying this cream after does not burn nothing, i do not put any other cream on.   I wait a few minutes just enough to set up my train case to get ready to my makeup on.  Night time I go through removing everything and use my clarifying lotion then apply my Redness cream.  Thats it.  It doesn't pill on me it's nice cream. It's not greasy.  Its been a month now.  My foundation looks better and  I checked outside and it looks good.  That's a plus.  I have many points and will use them to buy another jar.  Hoping for a sale.

reviews.headline: Not moisturizing at all.
reviews.comments: This "moisturizer" is not dry winter skin friendly. In fact, it dried out my skin so much that the texture of my skin changed.

reviews.headline: I like the product it takes away the redness
reviews.comments:
It takes away the redness and calms down the
 skin. It pairs well with Clinique CC cream for redness.

reviews.headline: Noticed a difference first time using this.
reviews.comments: I struggled with finding the right foundation, misjudging the pinkness in my face.  The Clinique consultatnt recommended this moisturizer.  It counteracts the redness without adding an errie green cast.  It is a great moisturizer as well.

reviews.headline: Didn't help with my redness
reviews.comments: I had high hopes for this because Clinique is pretty good quality. However, it did not help with my facial redness. I'm pretty sure I have rosacea (never officially diagnosed). Eucerin face lotion and beef tallow work better for my red skin tbh.

reviews.headline: So far I like it
reviews.comments: It sorta was a little burny the first two days, it does help alot with the redness like it says

reviews.headline: A little bit goes along way
reviews.comments: Should last a good amount of time
reviews.nickname: Do not post last name or email address

reviews.headline: Excellent for rosacea and sensitive skin, get it!
reviews.comments: This has been a lifesaver for my skin! I've had rosacea and sensitive skin for years. My cheeks would get so red and actually feel like they were burning and I'd never let anyone see me without makeup. Tried so many products. My dermatologist told me stick to a simple routine and don't fall into the fads of multiple products.  I started using this after cleansing and using the level 1 toner and after a few days what a difference. I now use it every morning, goes very well under my primer and foundation, and use it every evening. I'll follow with Farmacy Honey Halo at night and on days I'm not wearing makeup. My skin finally feels comfortable and I don't look crazy red all the time.  Highly recommend this product. Give it a consistent try if you have red sensitive skin and I hope you get relief like I have. Been using over a year now .

reviews.headline: Wanted to love it
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this. I have fair skin and deal with a lot of redness. It gets worse the older I get. The first day I used this product I felt like my face looked fresh, clear. I was so happy. Finally, a product that calmed the redness. I felt like the redness aged me. Over the next few days I noticed that my face was getting beat red. I looked like I had hives. By day 4 my face has itchy and burning. I am so sad. I don't typically react to skin care products like that. I am not sure what could be irritating my skin, but this is definitely causing inflammation. I'm disappointed that it cost this much for me to have recieved that kind of reaction.

reviews.headline: Helps sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have tried many different facial lotions that don't irritate my skin or cause a burning feeling with my rosacea. This is very light and calming to the face. It has really helped

reviews.headline: Smooth and calming
reviews.comments: This is a soothing, lightweight lotion.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin and redness around my nose and this has changed my skin! Its easy to use right away after washing my face its very light, so it does not clog my pores or leave my face feeling tacky. To see maximum results though, i would recommend using it with the redness relief cc cream by clinique. Havent found anything that works for my skin apart from dermablend in a long time!

media.headline: if you have blotchy rosacea this is for you!!

faceoff_positive.comments: I can't tell you how thrilled I am using this product! It has made such a difference in my skin appearance. The redness has reduced greatly. I have tried many, many products which claim to reduce redness but all they have done is reduce my bank balance! This cream does EXACTLY what it says it will do -- reduces redness, cools the 'heat' in my cheeks and absorbs quickly and cleanly. When I buy it, I buy in bulk!!! Thank you so much for creating a great product!
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Cream for Redness

faceoff_negative.comments:
Comfort On Call was an epic, miracle product created by Clinique. It was so great that I actually wrote to Clinique to tell them how it had changed a small part of my LIFE. Well no sooner, Clinique discontinued COC forever and replaced it with this, Redness Solutions.

Redness Solutions is nowhere near as great as COC was. As a replacement for the superior product it will have to do because even though it pales in comparison there is still nothing out there that compares for sensitive skin.

As a heavy duty moisturizer for highly sensitive skin and eczema sufferers this is better than anything else out there now that COC is gone. As a solution for redness...it has done nothing to change the tone of my skin or even it out in any way. I do not necessarily have a "redness" issue though, so I am probably not the best person to comment. I do, however, have red areas and as I said, this has not changed that for me a bit.

In addition, you must use only the absolute bare minimum amount at a time or else the product begins to "pill" up on your skin and can cause zits. Starting off with a tiny amount until your skin adjusts is probably a good idea.

In all, for people with extremely dry, sensitive skin and bad skin allergies this is a must-have but it just doesn't seem THAT great when compared to the product it replaced.
faceoff_negative.headline: Comfort On Call's Inferior Replacement

rollup.name: Redness Solutions Daily Relief Face Cream With Probiotic Technology
